name: Environment Variable Contains Secret
description: Alert on deployments with environment variables that contain 'SECRET'
rationale: Using secrets in environment variables may allow inspection into your secrets from the host or even through the orchestrator UI.
remediation: Migrate your secrets from environment variables to orchestrator secrets or your security team's secret management solution.

exclusions.name: Don't alert on deployment ocm-agent in openshift-ocm-agent-operator namespace
Don't alert on router-default in openshift-ingress namespace
Don't alert on image-registry in openshift-image-registry namespace
Don't alert on thanos-ruler-user-workload in openshift-user-workload-monitoring namespace
Don't alert on klusterlet-addon-controller-v2 in namespace open-cluster-management
Don't alert on managedcluster-import-controller-v2 in namespace multicluster-engine
